default: 1 courgette, sliced into thin ribbons on a mandolin
½ lemon, zest and juice only
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Lay the courgette ribbons onto two serving plates in a single layer.
Mix the rest of the ingredients together in a small bowl and drizzle over the courgette ribbons. Leave to marinate for ten minutes, then serve.
title: Courgette carpaccio with tomato, Kalamata olives and a lemon, mint and parsley dressing
